taskDescription:
Create and implement two essential workflow templates:
1. test_coordination.workflow - A basic test workflow for system verification
2. agent_coordination.workflow - A standard template for multi-agent coordination
workflowContext: We need to establish proper workflow infrastructure to support coordinated BUILD phase activities and general agent coordination.

workflowTemplate.name: Custom Workflow - ava
workflowTemplate.description: We need to establish proper workflow infrastructure to support coordinated BUILD phase activities and general agent coordination.

agents.taskDescription:
Create and implement two essential workflow templates:
1. test_coordination.workflow - A basic test workflow for system verification
2. agent_coordination.workflow - A standard template for multi-agent coordination

coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
